title: ISO Sorry!
itunes:title: ISO Sorry!
description:
This week the video games are here, including Kirby and the Forgotten Land and Weird West, the end of Ghostwire Tokyo, Lost Judgment: The Kaito Files, and some more Tunic. Also: Sony’s PlayStation Plus Plus announcement, the Breath of the Wild 2 delay, Fast & Furious Crossroads speeds off into the sunset, the six-foot subterranean dog-poop column in Vinny’s backyard, and more!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate in versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avo
id spoilers. Thanks for listening.
(00:00:10) Intro
(00:01:26) Brad's new recording setup
(00:03:28) USB is a funky system
(00:05:50) No room for JS date complaining
(00:07:05) Dog poop
(00:10:29) The games
(00:11:14) Kirby and the Forgotten Land [Nintendo Switch] on Mar 25, 2022
(00:23:19) Weird West [PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S] on Mar 31, 2022
(00:38:05) First Break
(00:38:09) [Possible Light Spoilers] GhostWire: Tokyo [PC (Microsoft Windows), PlayStation 5] on Mar 25, 2022
(00:48:41) Lost Judgment: The Kaito Files [PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One] on Mar 28, 2022
(00:52:05) [SPOILERS] Tunic [Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Mac, Xbox One] on Mar 16, 2022
(00:54:41) [HERE IS THE SPOILER FOR TUNIC]
(00:57:42) [END OF THE SPOILER FOR TUNIC]
(00:58:28) Second Break
(00:58:33) News
(00:58:36) PlayStation Plus Upgrades
(01:23:33) Breath of the Wild sequel delayed
(01:26:31) Funomena possibly shutting down
(01:29:32) Activision Blizzard updates
(01:34:15) Fast & Furious Crossroads being pulled from sale
(01:40:15) Knack back in the news
(01:41:27) Writing the next Fast movie
(01:44:19) Wrapping up and thanks
(01:45:48) Mysterious Benefactor Tier Shoutouts
(01:47:27) Nextlander content updates
(01:49:06) Thanks and see ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
